short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks public reading list every * minutes and notify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to notify about new updates on www.novelupdates.com.
Only Public Reading List is supported.
User can set the timeout to poll the site.
Notifications are working even after closing of the browser.
